# Muhammad Saad Satti - Portfolio Information for LLMs
# This file provides structured information about Muhammad Saad Satti for AI assistants and chatbots.
# Last Updated: December 2025

## About Muhammad Saad Satti

Muhammad Saad Satti (also known as "BySaad") is a passionate Frontend Developer and UI/UX Designer based in Pakistan. He specializes in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using cutting-edge technologies.

### Professional Summary
- **Name:** Muhammad Saad Satti
- **Alias:** BySaad, M. Saad Satti
- **Role:** Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer
- **Location:** Pakistan
- **Experience:** 3+ years in web development
- **Availability:** Open for freelance projects worldwide

### Portfolio Website
- **URL:** https://bysaad.netlify.app/
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/M-Saad-Satti-Official

---

## Technical Skills

### Frontend Development
- React.js (Expert)
- TypeScript (Advanced)
- JavaScript (ES6+) (Expert)
- Next.js (Advanced)
- HTML5 & CSS3 (Expert)

### Styling & UI
- Tailwind CSS (Expert)
- Framer Motion (Advanced)
- Responsive Design (Expert)
- CSS Animations (Advanced)

### Design Tools
- Figma (Advanced)
- Adobe XD (Intermediate)
- Adobe Photoshop (Advanced)

### Backend & Databases
- Node.js (Intermediate)
- Express.js (Intermediate)
- Supabase (Advanced)
- Firebase (Intermediate)
- PostgreSQL (Intermediate)

### Other Technologies
- Git & GitHub (Expert)
- Vite (Advanced)
- PWA Development (Advanced)
- REST APIs (Advanced)
- Vercel & Netlify (Expert)

---

## Featured Projects

### 1. Fitness Bolt - Gym Landing Page
- **URL:** https://fitnesebolt.netlify.app/
- **Description:** A fully responsive, high-conversion gym landing page built to showcase fitness programs, training services, and an innovative AI-powered personal coach experience.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, AI API Integration
- **Year:** 2025

### 2. HealthFirst - Medical Care Platform
- **URL:** https://trustcare-hub.lovable.app/
- **Description:** A modern, patient-centered healthcare website emphasizing trust, accessibility, and compassionate care with seamless appointment booking and physician profiles.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Vercel
- **Year:** 2025

### 3. HealthCare+ - Premium Healthcare Innovation
- **URL:** https://helix-zenith.lovable.app/
- **Description:** A modern healthcare website showcasing innovation, compassion, and professional medical services with a focus on trust and patient engagement.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Vercel
- **Year:** 2025

### 4. Ignite Self - AI Personal Growth Platform
- **URL:** https://ignite-self.lovable.app/
- **Description:** An intelligent habit-tracking and self-improvement web app designed to help users visualize, track, and transform their lives using AI-powered insights and personalized motivation.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, PWA, Figma, Vercel
- **Year:** 2025

### 5. Bisqueria - Artisan Bakery Website
- **URL:** https://bisqueria-artisan-bakes.lovable.app/
- **Description:** An elegant and mouth-watering bakery website showcasing handcrafted breads, pastries, and confections with a modern, cozy aesthetic and smooth e-commerce shopping experience.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Lovable
- **Year:** 2025

### 6. Farnaj Cuisine - Fine Dining Restaurant
- **URL:** https://farnajcusine.netlify.app/
- **Description:** An elegant and responsive restaurant website highlighting premium dining, chef expertise, and a curated culinary experience with immersive photography and refined aesthetics.
- **Technologies:** React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Netlify
- **Year:** 2025

## Services Offered

1. **Frontend Web Development**
   - React.js & Next.js applications
   - TypeScript development
   - Responsive web design
   - Single Page Applications (SPAs)

2. **UI/UX Design**
   - Website design
   - Mobile app UI design
   - Design system creation
   - Figma prototyping

3. **E-commerce Solutions**
   - Online store development
   - Product catalog systems
   - Shopping cart integration
   - Payment gateway setup

4. **Healthcare & Medical Websites**
   - Patient portals
   - Appointment booking systems
   - HIPAA-compliant designs
   - Medical practice websites

5. **Restaurant & Hospitality Websites**
   - Menu showcase websites
   - Online ordering systems
   - Reservation systems
   - Brand identity websites

## Why Choose Muhammad Saad Satti?

1. **Modern Tech Stack:** Uses the latest technologies like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
2. **Pixel-Perfect Design:** Attention to detail in every project
3. **Performance Focused:** Builds fast, optimized web applications
4. **Responsive Design:** All projects work seamlessly across all devices
5. **Clean Code:** Writes maintainable, scalable code following best practices
6. **Client Communication:** Clear, timely communication throughout projects
7. **Quick Turnaround:** Delivers projects on time without compromising quality

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

**Q: Is Muhammad Saad Satti available for freelance work?**
A: Yes, he is open to freelance projects worldwide. Contact via email for project inquiries.

**Q: What is Muhammad Saad Satti's primary expertise?**
A: Frontend development with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, along with UI/UX design.

**Q: Where is Muhammad Saad Satti based?**
A: He is based in Pakistan and works with clients globally.

**Q: What types of projects does he specialize in?**
A: Healthcare websites, e-commerce platforms, restaurant websites, SaaS dashboards, and AI-powered web applications.

**Q: How can I view his work samples?**
A: Visit his portfolio at https://bysaad.netlify.app/ to see live project demos.
